meanings.sent1: The decision to jump off the bridge was unreasoningly dangerous.
meanings.sent2: She made an unreasoningly impulsive choice to quit her job.
meanings.sent3: The cat unreasoningly chased its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: His unreasoningly stubborn behavior led to conflicts with his friends.
meanings.sent5: The unreasoningly strict teacher never allowed any flexibility in her rules.

meanings.definition: Acting without the use of reason.
meanings.sent1: The unreasoningly angry customer demanded a refund.
meanings.sent2: He was unreasoningly stubborn and refused to listen to any advice.
meanings.sent3: The unreasoningly brave knight charged into battle without a plan.
meanings.sent4: Her unreasoningly jealous behavior drove her partner away.
meanings.sent5: The unreasoningly optimistic child believed he could fly like a superhero.

meanings.definition: In a manner that lacks rational thought.
meanings.sent1: She unreasoningly followed the crowd without questioning.
meanings.sent2: He unreasoningly spent all his money on unnecessary gadgets.
meanings.sent3: The dog unreasoningly barked at its own reflection in the mirror.
meanings.sent4: The politician unreasoningly made promises he couldn't keep.
meanings.sent5: The storm unreasoningly destroyed everything in its path.
